premise_source_doc_sentence: `` Hotline Bling '' is a song by Canadian rapper Drake , which serves as the lead single from his fourth studio album Views .
The album included the singles `` Hotline Bling '' , `` One Dance '' , `` Pop Style '' , `` Controlla '' and `` Too Good '' , all of which peaked within the top 20 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart .

The album was supported by five singles : `` Hotline Bling ''  (  which was included as a bonus track  )  , `` One Dance '' featuring Wizkid and Kyla , `` Pop Style '' featuring The Throne  (  Jay Z and Kanye West  )  , `` Controlla '' and `` Too Good '' featuring Rihanna .
The single `` Hotline Bling '' secured him his second and third Grammy win , for Best Rap/Sung Performance and Best Rap Song , at the organization 's 59th ceremony .
The song was originally titled `` Hotline Bling  (  Cha Cha Remix  )  '' after Virginia rapper D.R.A.M 's `` Cha Cha '' when it premiered on Beats 1 OVO Sound Radio in July 2015 .
